byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and CORAL DAVENPORT

abstract: Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau will arrive in Washington for state dinner with Pres Obama, first official visit by Canadian leader in 19 years; focus of visit will be leaders' combined efforts to reduce emissions that contribute to global warming.
lead_paragraph: The first state visit by a Canadian leader in 19 years was made possible in part by new pledges of cooperation on combating climate change.

headline.main: Justin Trudeau, Canadian Prime Minister, Making Rare Official Visit
headline.print_headline: Canadian Leader Making Rare State Visit

snippet: The first state visit by a Canadian leader in 19 years was made possible in part by new pledges of cooperation on combating climate change.

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
